SELECT SM_GRP_CD AS smGrpCd , DISUSE_DIV AS disuseDiv , CNG_QNT AS cngQnt , INSUR_DIV AS insurDiv , CUST AS cust , REG_DATE AS regDate , MID_GRP_CD AS midGrpCd , VMI_YB AS vmiYb , MOD_WORKER_ID AS modWorkerId , CTRT_START_DATE AS ctrtStartDate , CTRT_END_DATE AS ctrtEndDate , EDI_CD AS ediCd , ORD_UNIT AS ordUnit , CTRT_PRICE AS ctrtPrice , STAND AS stand , GDS_CD AS gdsCd , BIG_GRP_CD AS bigGrpCd , SUBUL_UNIT AS subulUnit , REG_WORKER_IP AS regWorkerIp , DISUSE_DATE AS disuseDate , MOD_DATE AS modDate , SPLIES_DIV AS spliesDiv , MOD_WORKER_IP AS modWorkerIp , RACK_NO AS rackNo , PIC_LOC AS picLoc , GDS_NM AS gdsNm , REG_WORKER_ID AS regWorkerId , WH AS wh , USE_DEPT AS useDept , NOTE AS note FROM LC_GDS
AND GDS_CD LIKE '%'||#{gdsCd}||'%'
AND GDS_NM LIKE '%'||#{gdsNm}||'%'
AND BIG_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{bGrpCd}||'%'
AND MID_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{mGrpCd}||'%'
AND SM_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{sGrpCd}||'%'
ORDER BY GDS_CD

SELECT GDS_CD AS code , GDS_NM AS value FROM LC_GDS
AND GDS_CD LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%'
AND GDS_NM LIKE '%'||#{cdNm}||'%'
ORDER BY GDS_CD
SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(GDS_CD),4,6)+1 FROM LC_GDS WHERE GDS_CD LIKE #{preCode}||'%'
